entities.name: fidelius chard
entities.description: The Fidelius Charm is a spell that conceals the location of an object or person. It is mentioned in the text as stopping working at a certain point.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story. He is able to Disapparate with the help of the Fidelius Charm.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who helps Harry Potter and Hermione Granger in their mission. He climbs onto Harry's back to Disapparate.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a friend of Harry Potter and helps him in his mission. She pulls out the Invisibility Cloak to help them Disapparate.

entities.name: leaky cauldron
entities.description: The Leaky Cauldron is an inn that serves as the entrance to Diagon Alley. Harry concentrates on it to Disapparate.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is a hidden street in London where wizards and witches can buy magical items. It is accessible through the Leaky Cauldron.

relationships.description: Harry Potter carries Griphook on his back to Disapparate.
Hermione Granger possesses the Invisibility Cloak, which she uses to help Harry and Griphook Disapparate.
Harry Potter concentrates on the Leaky Cauldron to Disapparate.
